      • createArena

        public void createArena(java.lang.String svgFilename,

      • setupAgent

        public void setupAgent(int number,
              double[][] wm,
              double maxDistance,
              double frictionDistance)
        Parameters:
        number - number of the agent/robot
        wm - composed weight matrix of size neurons*(inputs+neurons+1)
        maxDistance - maximum distance of distance sensors
        frictionDistance - distance of friction point sensors Number of sensors as well as number of neurons is determined from the size of the weight matrix. You can use either this function called number of agents time, or use setupExperiment function, which distributs the weight matrices evenly.

      • setupAgent

              double frictionDistance)

      • setupExperiment

        public void setupExperiment(double[][][] wm,
                   double maxDistance,
                   double frictionDistance)
        Parameters:
        wm - Weight matrices to be setup to the controllers. The weight matrices are evenly distributed among the agents.
        maxDistance -
        frictionDistance -
